Blackfang was still weak from the energy drain, but he would be able 
to hold out for some times.

Blackfang: All right, here's the plan. This is another pod, but it's 
more damaged than the first. Get back to the base with the first and 
come back to me with more energy sources. I'll work on it for now.

His technical knowledge allowed him to perform some operations on the 
pod, but they were limited.

Blackfang: For the Matrix's sake, I'm a warrior, not a technician!

> ???::
> 
> The control panel opened and showed the protophorm's status. The 
> report said that the Proptophorm was damaged but alive, its 
beastmode 
> had been taken and it was in stasis lock. The control panel reported 
> too that the a full scan of damage was advisable before a reparation 
> process.
